input.sentences: a group went to visit a greenhouse .
there was this really nice fountain .
the vegetation on the inside was so diverse .
there is also a pretty cool statue .

output.sentences: We visited the greenhouse to look at plants.
The fountain looked nice in the spring.
The vegetation inside of the forest was so diverse.
The statue we saw was pretty cool.
The lion statue was my sisters favorite.
